titles: The historie of ane nobil and wailzeand squyer, William Meldrum, vmquhyle Laird of Cleische and Bynnis. Compylit be Sir Dauid Lyndesay of the Mont, alias, Lyoun, King of Armes. H C The testament of the said Williame Meldrum Squyer. Compylit alswa be Sir Dauid Lyndesay, &c.
author: Lindsay, David, Sir, fl. 1490-1555.
notes: The letters H C appear individually between paragraph marks on the title page.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio regali.
Running title reads: The squyer of the Bynnis.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Meldrum, William --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
